section1.content: JP Studio was founded in October 2023 by a young couple. In this information-explosive E-Age, websites have become an indispensable tool for generating income. Joshua is a full-stack engineer, while Penny handles PM-related tasks. Although we are a newly established personal studio, we have boundless hope and passion for the future. Currently, we operate on a project basis, with transparent pricing and high levels of customization. If you're interested in a quote or joining us, please feel free to contact us.

section3.content: Besides taking on client projects, JP Studio has also launched web courses tailored for career transitions and further education in relevant fields. These courses include series like 'Starting from Scratch: Frontend Development', 'JS Demystified', 'Vue3', 'React Hooks', and more. Designed for those preparing for career changes or wishing to acquire new skills, we offer both one-on-one and small-group interactive sessions. If you're interested, feel free to inquire by leaving a message in the 'Contact Us' section below. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
